20101223030011.000|20101223030011.000|CC1|ULCERS.

20101223030017.000|20101223030021.000|CC1|SHE CAME RIGHT TO THE CAPITAL TO
20101223030021.000|20101223030021.000|CC1|VOTE.

20101223030401.000|20101223030403.000|CC1|NATIONAL SECURITY PRIORITY FOR  
20101223030403.000|20101223030404.000|CC1|THIS CONGRESS.                  
20101223030404.000|20101223030406.000|CC1|WE ALSO OVERTURNED A 17-YEAR-OLD
20101223030406.000|20101223030408.000|CC1|LAW AND A LONGSTANDING INJUSTICE
20101223030408.000|20101223030410.000|CC1|BY FINALLY ENDING DON'T ASK,
